  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_113937</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113937</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Diagram for gravitational lines of forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm für Gravitationszeilen der Kräfte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme pour les lignes de la gravité des 
forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama para linhas gravitacionais das forças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema per le righe gravitazionali delle forze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα για τις βαρύτητας γραμμές δυνάμεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama para las líneas gravitacionales de 
fuerzas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that the lines of forces representing the planet's gravitational force spread out over a greater area at greater distances.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Inverse square law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß die Zeilen 
der Kräfte, welche die Gravitationskraft des Planeten darstellen, 
heraus über einem grösseren Bereich in grösseren Abständen 
verbreiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre que les lignes des forces 
représentant la force de la gravité de la planète étendent 
au-dessus d'une plus grande zone à de plus grandes distances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que as linhas das forças 
que representam a força gravitacional do planeta espalham para fora 
sobre uma área mais grande em umas distâncias mais grandes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che le righe delle forze 
che rappresentano la forza gravitazionale del pianeta distribuiscono 
fuori in una zona più grande alle distanze più grandi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι οι γραμμές 
δυνάμεων που αντιπροσωπεύουν τη βαρύτητας δύναμη του πλανήτη 
είναι εξαπλωμένες έξω σε μια μεγαλύτερη περιοχή στις μεγαλύτερες
αποστάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que las líneas de las 
fuerzas que representan la fuerza gravitacional del planeta se separan
hacia fuera sobre una mayor área en mayores distancias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitationskraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umgekehrtes quadratisches Gesetz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de la gravité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pesanteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loi carrée inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Planètes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distância</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força gravitacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravidade</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planetas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gravità</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianeti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απόσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητας δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίστροφος τετραγωνικός νόμος</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
